nodes.explanation: words related to traditional or old-fashioned concepts or objects
the phrase "old", especially when referring to traditional or familiar things
adjectives related to a traditional or old-fashioned style or manner
phrases related to traditional or old-fashioned concepts or items
mentions of things related to traditional or old-fashioned ways of doing something
phrases related to old-school or traditional style or methods
mentions of or references to "old-fashioned" items, practices, or concepts
phrases containing the expression "old" in relation to historic or past references
